content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":139667,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/39f5269e-174e-4634-a9dd-876122c0a6f2/welcome_img.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/39f5269e-174e-4634-a9dd-876122c0a6f2/welcome_img.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"welcome_img.png\",\"name\":\"welcome_img.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"39f5269e-174e-4634-a9dd-876122c0a6f2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":295,\"height\":295},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dear colleague! \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We’re happy to welcome you to our amazing EPAM Keurig Dr Pepper team! We’re looking forward to start working with you, and to make it a success we prepared some useful information that we believe will help you to onboard better and faster. We do really care about our people and we want them to fully understand the atmosphere they’re going to work in. So please, make yourself comfortable, make a cup of a good coffee or tea and enjoy the adventure!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rIn the video below Jane, one of the account HR specialists, shares the agenda for the whole account adaptation module. Please, look it through and follow the next page after. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=dJ8V9AoW\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
